name: Republic Services, Inc.
description: Republic Services, Inc. is a leading provider of waste management and environmental services in the United States. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, the company focuses on providing reliable waste collection, recycling, and disposal services to both residential and commercial customers. With a commitment to sustainability, Republic Services aims to reduce the environmental impact of waste by promoting recycling and waste diversion initiatives. The company operates a vast network of collection operations, transfer stations, recycling facilities, and landfills. Their services include solid waste collection, recycling, and disposal, as well as a variety of specialized services for industrial and construction clients. Republic Services is dedicated to innovation and operational excellence, investing in technology to enhance service delivery and efficiency. The company’s sustainability initiatives are focused on reducing greenhouse gas emissions, increasing recycling rates, and educating communities about waste reduction. With over 36,000 employees and a presence in more than 40 states, Republic Services has established itself as a trusted partner in environmental stewardship and waste management solutions.
